summary: This little mod should enable the player to get more perks in Enchanting and Conjuration.
descriptionHtml:
My second mod and I'm still trying to get things right. Again I hope the intern language is english and that the mod works, since I cant test it myself.

So what is this mod supposed to do? It's simple. It should adds afew perks to Enchanting so that up to 10 enchantments become possible. Also this mod adds perks to Conjuration so up to 10 summons can be done.
I guess there are already mutiple similiar mods but like I said I am still a beginner. Also I am not sure if this mod is lore-friendly or not.

If you are brave enough to download I hope you write a little post afterwards so I can learn if things work out or not. Also I am glad for bug reports. Once I read them I see what I can do, but that may take some time.
author: Diilsoszaam
